title: Automated Manufacturing Cell
blurb: Designed and built a fully automated manufacturing cell using industrial robots and PLC control systems for precision assembly operations.
descriptionMD:
This project involved designing a complete automated manufacturing solution for small-scale precision assembly. The system integrates:

- **Industrial Robot Arm**: 6-axis ABB robot for pick-and-place operations
- **Vision System**: Computer vision for quality control and part alignment
- **PLC Control**: Siemens S7-1200 for process control and safety systems
- **Conveyor Integration**: Automated material handling and sorting

The system achieved 95% uptime and reduced assembly time by 60% compared to manual operations.

title: Custom Robotic Arm Controller
blurb: Developed a custom 6-DOF robotic arm with advanced control algorithms and real-time path planning capabilities.
descriptionMD:
Built from the ground up, this robotic arm features:

- **Mechanical Design**: Custom 6-DOF configuration with aluminum construction
- **Control System**: Real-time inverse kinematics and trajectory planning
- **User Interface**: Custom GUI for programming and operation
- **Safety Features**: Emergency stops, collision detection, and workspace limits

The arm can handle payloads up to 2kg with Â±0.5mm repeatability accuracy.

title: Smart Greenhouse Automation System
blurb: IoT-enabled greenhouse automation system with climate control, irrigation management, and crop monitoring capabilities.
descriptionMD:
A comprehensive automation solution for greenhouse management:

- **Environmental Control**: Automated temperature, humidity, and light control
- **Irrigation System**: Soil moisture-based watering with nutrient injection
- **Monitoring Dashboard**: Real-time data visualization and remote monitoring
- **Machine Learning**: Predictive analytics for optimal growing conditions

Reduced water usage by 40% and increased crop yield by 25% in field testing.

title: Autonomous Inspection Drone
blurb: Developed an autonomous drone system for infrastructure inspection with computer vision and automated flight path planning.
descriptionMD:
An autonomous drone platform for industrial inspection:

- **Flight Control**: Custom flight controller with GPS and obstacle avoidance
- **Computer Vision**: Automated defect detection using deep learning
- **Data Collection**: High-resolution imaging and thermal analysis
- **Reporting System**: Automated inspection reports with GPS-tagged findings

Successfully inspected over 50 industrial structures with 90% defect detection accuracy.
